description: Extract rich information from images and video.

blocks.name: analyzeImage
blocks.description: This operation extracts a rich set of visual features based on the image content.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: image
args.info: Supported input methods: raw image binary or image URL.

args.name: details
args.info: A string indicating which domain-specific details to return. Multiple values should be comma-separated. Must be: Celebrities or Landmarks

args.name: visualFeatures
args.info: An array indicating what visual feature types to return. Valid visual feature types include: Categories, Tags, Description, Faces, Color, Adult.

blocks.name: describeImage
blocks.description: This operation generates a description of an image in human readable language with complete sentences. The description is based on a collection of content tags, which are also returned by the operation. More than one description can be generated for each image. Descriptions are ordered by their confidence score. All descriptions are in English.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: image
args.info: Supported input methods: raw image binary or image URL.

args.name: maxCandidates
args.info: Maximum number of candidate descriptions to be returned. The default is 1.

blocks.name: getThumbnail
blocks.description: This operation generates a thumbnail image with the user-specified width and height. By default, the service analyzes the image, identifies the region of interest (ROI), and generates smart cropping coordinates based on the ROI. Smart cropping helps when you specify an aspect ratio that differs from that of the input image.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: image
args.info: Supported input methods: raw image binary or image URL.

args.name: width
args.info: Width of the thumbnail. It must be between 1 and 1024. Recommended minimum of 50.

args.name: height
args.info: Height of the thumbnail. It must be between 1 and 1024. Recommended minimum of 50.

args.name: smartCropping
args.info: Boolean flag for enabling smart cropping.

blocks.name: ocr
blocks.description: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) detects text in an image and extracts the recognized characters into a machine-usable character stream.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: image
args.info: Supported input methods: raw image binary or image URL.

args.name: language
args.info: The BCP-47 language code of the text to be detected in the image.The default value is 'unk', then the service will auto detect the language of the text in the image. Supported languages: unk (AutoDetect), zh-Hans (ChineseSimplified), zh-Hant (ChineseTraditional), cs (Czech), da (Danish), nl (Dutch), en (English), fi (Finnish), fr (French), de (German), el (Greek), hu (Hungarian), it (Italian), Ja (Japanese), ko (Korean), nb (Norwegian), pl (Polish), pt (Portuguese, ru (Russian), es (Spanish), sv (Swedish), tr (Turkish).

args.name: detectOrientation
args.info: Whether detect the text orientation in the image. With detectOrientation=true the OCR service tries to detect the image orientation and correct it before further processing (e.g. if it's upside-down).

blocks.name: tagImage
blocks.description: This operation generates a list of words, or tags, that are relevant to the content of the supplied image.

args.name: subscriptionKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Microsoft Cognitive Servisces.

args.name: image
args.info: Supported input methods: raw image binary or image URL.
